communityItems.title:
Samsung KX50:
The Future in Focus
communityItems.description: Samsung KX invited six futurists and academics to look ahead to the next 50 years of digital evolution and predict how it will affect our cities, our travel, our working lives, our food, our leisure and our health.
communityItems.__anchor desc: offset the image position when item is inactive. in %

communityItems.title: Age UK Camden
communityItems.description: Samsung KX have teamed up with Age UK Camden to give over 55’s in Camden the opportunity to upskill and learn ways of using new technology to benefit them in everyday life. Samsung KX also served as the exhibition space for Age UK Camden’s recent week-long photography exhibition that highlighted the vital support that has been provided to thousands of older Camden residents since lockdown began.

communityItems.title: Mind in Camden
communityItems.description: Samsung KX has worked with Mind in Camden to create a safe and welcoming space, in which members can attend weekly coffee mornings, receiving complimentary hot drinks and refreshments, as well as providing a dial in service, where members can call in on a Galaxy Tab S7 to speak to others.
